<rule id="quarkus-amazon-lambda-xray-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="aws-xray-recorder-sdk-aws-sdk-v2" groupId="com.amazonaws"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="default">
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'aws-xray-recorder-sdk-aws-sdk-v2' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-amazon-lambda-xray' extension">
                        <message>
                            Replace the `com.amazonaws:aws-xray-recorder-sdk-aws-sdk-v2` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-amazon-lambda-xray`  
                            Further information in the link below.
                        </message>
                        <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/aws-lambda#tracing-with-aws-xray-and-graalvm" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
